sen.j: 日本三大天神（にほんさんだいてんじん）とは、日本の代表的な3ヶ所の天満宮の総称である。
sen.e: The three typical Tenman-gu Shrine are collectively called as the Three Great Tenjins of Japan
The three typical Tenman-gu Shrine are collectively called as the Three Great Tenjins of Japan
The three typical Tenmangu Shrines are collectively called as "Nihon Sandai Tenjin" or the Three Great Tenjins of Japan.
sen.cmt: 直後の訳文で日本三大天神→"Nihon Sandai Tenjin"とされており、これが"Three Great Tenjins of Japan"を指すことを明確にするため文章を修正しました。Tenman-gu Shrine→Tenmangu Shrinesとし、文末のピリオドを加えました。

sen.j: 別名日本三天神とも言われる。
sen.e: "Nihon Sandai Tenjin" is shortened to "Nihon San Tenjin."
"Nihon Sandai Tenjin" is shortened to "Nihon San Tenjin."
"Nihon Sandai Tenjin" is shortened to "Nihon San Tenjin."

sen.j: 大宰府天満宮・北野天満宮・大阪天満宮の3ヶ所をもって日本三天神と称する。
sen.e: Dazaifu-tenmangu Shrine, Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine, and Osaka Tenman-gu Shrine are referred to as the Three Great Tenjins of Japan.
Dazaifu-tenmangu Shrine, Kitano Tenman-gu Shrine, and Osaka Tenman-gu Shrine are referred to as the Three Great Tenjins of Japan.
Dazaifu Tenmangu Shrine, Kitano Tenmangu Shrine, and Osaka Tenmangu Shrine are referred to as the Three Great Tenjins of Japan.
sen.cmt: 天満宮→Tenmangu Shrineに統一しました。

sen.j: 異説として大阪天満宮を外して、防府天満宮、または小平潟天満宮を入れる場合もある。
sen.e: According to a different theory, Hofu-tenmangu Shrine or Kobiragata-tenmangu Shrine may be included instead of Osaka Tenman-gu Shrine.
According to a different theory, the Hofu-tenmangu Shrine or Kobiragata-tenmangu Shrine may be included instead of the Osaka Tenman-gu Shrine.
According to a different theory, the Hofu Tenmangu Shrine or Kobiragata Tenmangu Shrine may be included instead of the Osaka Tenmangu Shrine.
sen.cmt: 天満宮→Tenmangu Shrineに統一しました。
